Class GameServer

    public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameSrvrIntfc
    The implementaion of a server, hosting multiple MUDs.

      • getMUD

        public MUD getMUD(java.lang.String name)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Fetches an MUD from a server, through searching by name. If such MUD cannot be found, returns null.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • dropMUD

        public void dropMUD(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes an MUD from a server. Looks for an MUD with a given name. Note, that this implementation makes the method remove only the first occurrence of an MUD, which has a given name.
        Specified by:
        dropMUD in interface GameSrvrIntfc
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the MUD to be removed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
